pros: The supervisors I had were generally nice - I held several positions during my time here as a student worker. It's a pretty laid back and friendly environment
cons: The whole student-worker system just does not work very well for one main reason: they never fire anyone. Now it's not entirely their fault because they have to make jobs available to students. But still. It breeds laziness and ineptitude among student workers and many people just don't do their jobs.
